```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
all_info = read_csv(file = "./img/all_info.csv")
```

# A380 vs B747

```{r}
set.seed(123)

prop_split = 0.8
prop_train = prop_split*prop_split
prop_test = 1-prop_split
prop_validation = prop_split*prop_test

a380_v_b747 = all_info %>% 
  dplyr::filter(model %in% c("A320", "B747")) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    purpose = sample(x = c("train", "test", "validation"),
                     size = nrow(.),
                     replace = TRUE,
                     prob = c(prop_train, prop_test, prop_validation)))

a380_v_b747
write_csv(x = a380_v_b747, file = "./img/a380_v_b747.csv")
```
